Hi there! I'm Adam, a software engineer, New Yorker, and Brandeis University '21 alum with a passion for devops, automation, growth marketing and helping others. I love bringing people and various ideas & resources together to solve any challenge. When not programming, you can find me singing a cappella or developing various graphic designs or projects!
